name: Hotel Magellan

reviews.text: This hotel is a real find, tucked away on a quiet street in a safe and quiet area of Paris. The staff was friendly, check-in was quick. The rooms small but excellently maintained, offer free wifi, flat screen tv, ironing board and iron, in room safe, comfortable beds, bath with shower. A fantastic buffet breakfast is served each morning including freshly squeezed orange juice, a variety of meats and cheeses, soft boiled eggs, pastry and a variety of breads, plus other items. If you prefer, breakfast can be served in your room or you may take breakfast on the nice garden patio weather permitting. The hotel is also 100% non smoking. It is about a 10 minute walk to the nearest metro station Pereire on line 3. You certainly won't be disappointed in this hotel.
reviews.title: A Real Gem
Enjoyed my stay @ Magellan Hotel
reviews.text: Hotel located in a nice and safe neighbourhood very close to Pereire station, in the area you can find local restaurant and couple of supermarkets as well.
Breakfast was superb, room cozy and clean, staff polite and helpful.
reviews.title: Very clean, perfect location & awesome breakfast

reviews.text: Surely I ll come back on my next visit to Paris.
reviews.title: Days out in Paris

reviews.text: Hotel is perfectly located, my room was clean, breakfast was good and tasty. The only issue I met was poor sound isolation in the room - it was uncomfortable hearing noises from hallway and other rooms.
reviews.title: Comfortable, welcoming hotel

description: The Hotel Magellan is a boutique hotel near the Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysees. The Haussmann style building provides a capacity of 72 rooms where everything has been planned for the greater comfort of our guests.All rooms come with a flat screen TV broadcasting numerous satellite channels, free wireless internet, a courtesy tray for your hot drinks, ironing facilities (iron and ironing board).Room service is proposed in the morning for breakfast and evening for a light dinner in your room.
